lead_paragraph: Manchester United tied visiting Chelsea, 1-1, yesterday in a showdown between the top two teams in the English Premier League. Louis Saha gave United the lead in the 29th minute at Old Trafford, but Ricardo Carvalho headed in the tying goal in the 69th minute. United leads the league with 35 points, followed by Chelsea with 32.
